title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Supply Chain Optimization: Analyzed delivery driver datasets with Python & Power BI to improve scheduling and built automated Bash/Python ETL pipelines, boosting driver utilization by ~20% and cutting report time from 8 h → 1 h.

title: AI Engineer Intern
description: Multi-Agent RAG System: Built a containerized, graph-based local RAG pipeline (LangGraph + Ollama + Neo4j + PostgreSQL) for research assistance, generating Knowledge Graphs from PDFs and improving multi-hop query accuracy by ~30%, cutting research analysis time by 10+ hours/week.

title: Data Engineer Intern
description: Cloud Data Platform Modernization: Optimised Redshift data warehouse performance (-30% storage, -15% latency) and deployed a SageMaker Unified Studio analytics zone (Bedrock, Glue, Athena, DataZone) with Terraform IaC, centralizing data for 50+ users and enabling 100M+ daily clickstream insights via Firehose → S3 → Redshift → Quicksight.
